title: Need a T3 Mordecai Brown PSA 5 or better
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Need a T3 Mordecai Brown PSA 5 or better
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Dennis
Will pay or trade top dollar value for a 1911 Turkey Red (T3) M. Brown PSA 5... I have all other T3 HOF'ers in 5's or better and I've been hung up for quite a while trying to upgrade this last PSA 4 HOF'er to 5... I also have a couple of common T3 PSA 5's and a 6 that can be entered into trade talks...

If you have one, please shoot me an email...

Many thanks,

Dennis
